General.Name: Guangdong Weide Information Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Guangdong Weide Information Technology CO,.Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of intelligent security equipment and information security cloud platforms in China. The company provides information security products and services for industrial customers. It also offers intelligent security equipment primarily includes intelligent security gateway, wireless communication, and other intelligent equipment for network companies and power equipment providers; information security cloud platform that integrates various information security software and hardware products, as well as technologies according to the specific conditions of the customer's industry and environment; and provides customers with information security solutions, which improves their information security capabilities. Guangdong Weide Information Technology CO,.Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
